pr_title: Add hard_bounds support for histogram field-based histograms

timeline.message:
Add hard_bounds support for histogram field-based histograms

hard_bounds should now support histogram fields, previously hard bounds
on histogram fields were ignored.

Closes #62124

replies.bodyText: No, it's the same, I will remove it. Thanks for catching it! I was going to turn it this into a histogram field test before I realized that I cannot put it here and it needs to go into x-pack because of dependencies.
